articles.author: Anthony Robledo
articles.title: More than 64,000 pounds of butter recalled over undeclared milk: FDA - USA Today
articles.description: Bunge North America recalled more than 64,000 pounds of its NH European Style Butter Blend due to potential undeclared milk allergens, the FDA said.
articles.content:
More than 64,000 pounds of butter have been recalled due to potential undeclared milk allergens, according to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.
